title._content: [Union case for daguerreotype, ambrotype, or tintype showing crossed cannons and muskets behind patriotic shield within scroll frame] (LOC)

description._content: [Union case for daguerreotype, ambrotype, or tintype showing crossed cannons and muskets behind patriotic shield within scroll frame] [between 1852 and 1866] 1 item : thermoplastic ; 9.6 x 8.4 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Berg, no. 1-50. Gift; Tom Liljenquist; 2010; (DLC/PP-2010:105). Format: Union cases--1850-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Ambrotype/Tintype filing series (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650518 Liljenquist Family collection (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650519 More information about this collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.lilj Persistent URL: hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.27107 Call Number: AMB/TIN no. 2254
